Hi Chrissy!  You sound so busy!  What is an eclectic witch?  I share a lot =
of your same interests but haven't pursued them to any great extent.  Have =
you ever read "Hands of Light" by Barbara Brennan?  You'll find lots of fri=
endly people and useful information here.  Welcome!

Robin

  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
  From: Christine<mailto:ladychrissyleo@...> 
  To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Wednesday,=
 February 27, 2008 10:15 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] New here


  I am 36 years=
 old and I am an Eclectic Witch, Reiki Master and
  Lightworker. I am also =
a psychic,medium, empath, Paranormal
  Investigator. I am involved in spiri=
t rescue. I am taking classes to
  develop my gift more.
  I am taking psyc=
hic development, numerology, tarot, chakras,
  mediumship etc.

  I have se=
en ghosts since I was 5.

  Interested in evps. I bought the radio shack ra=
dio last night and I
  hacked it. I need to know what else I need to do evp=
s and download
  them into my pc.

  Thank you for the help.
  hugs
  Lady =
Chrissy
